column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I wanted to love this place! But the combination of the long wait then soggy calamari and warm pizza
column2: it just all went downhill. The service could have been better too by offering us to replace the app/pizza since I'm sure she knew the pizza was cold. Watching every other table with piping hot pizza
column3: I knew something was wrong. Â Didn't even want to complain since it was already 10:30pm and we already missed the fireworks. What a disastrous night.
